description: This Dart source file defines a class 'Env' that manages environment configuration for a Flutter application, including loading environment variables from a '.env' file and providing the backend base URL based on the environment and platform.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A utility class responsible for loading environment variables and providing configuration values such as the backend URL.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads environment variables from a '.env' file, ignoring errors if the file is missing.

methods.name: backendBaseUrl
methods.description: A getter that returns the backend base URL, determined by environment variables and platform type.
